data.name: Fairy Biography - adult patch
data.detailed_description:
Game Background:
Recently, a group of spirits have been sealed in the ancient painting volume fled, They go around doing evil, the world is in danger! As guardians of the scroll, re-seal the spirits inside the scroll to keep people safe. No time to explain, Add your wish list now~
Gameplay introduction:
Players qualify for the game by using a paintbrush to enclose the mischievous spirits into the Elder Scrolls., Unlock collect different kinds of beauty spirits.
Game features:
Beautiful realistic painting style
10 beautiful CG
Multiple interactive gameplay
Skip (don't use)
The game album contains 10 dynamic CGs that can interact with beauties
Regarding adult content, you need to click on the album to enter, and then click on the characters in the album to enter the interactive interface，All women are adults and do not include extreme sexual behaviors such as violent sexual assault.

Thank you for your support of Lovely Games Studio.

data.short_description: Spirits sealed in the Scrolls have escaped to the human world. As the heir to the Elder Scrolls, it is your mission to protect the world order and hunt down the Spirits that have escaped. Take your courage and step on your journey now!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef750
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
